description:
io: SectionReader.ReadAt should return EOF when buf is not fully read
Fixes issue 4392.

messages.text:
LGTM

minux, looks like you forgot to hg mail this.
(found via issue 4392)

io: SectionReader.ReadAt should return EOF when buf is not fully read
Fixes issue 4392.
